pullrequest.title: Use upstream CURL::libcurl imported target in FindIgnCURL.cmake if available

content.raw: I accidentally opened this PR  against `default` , but my aim was actually to fix `ign-cmake0`, see [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/175/use-upstream-curl-libcurl-imported-target/diff](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/175/use-upstream-curl-libcurl-imported-target/diff) for more details.
content.html: I accidentally opened this PR against default , but my aim was actually to fix ign-cmake0, see #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/175/use-upstream-curl-libcurl-imported-target/diff for more details.
